notes.note:
Fixed compatibility problems with websites that use the new Compression Dictionaries technology, such as ChatGPT, by temporarily disabling the feature. ([Bug 2010712][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2010712

Fixed an issue where the address autofill menu incorrectly appeared on simple login forms. ([Bug 2006756][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2006756

Fixed an issue where time formats could cause certain websites to display incorrectly. ([Bug 2010411][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2010411

text:
Thanks for using Firefox! Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you at [Android Support][1]


  [1]: https://mzl.la/AndroidSupport
title: Firefox for Android 147.0.1 Release
